attributes.action: once again not allow the comments yet again made by iris robinson to go unreprimanded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a member of the gay community in northern ireland we find this ladies comments offensive and unexceptable and he call for her to be withdrawn from office as soon as possible

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
